trans-unit.source: A system-provided <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProviderFactory" /> implementation used to create a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider" /> instance that uses a SQL database to store persisted service state data.
trans-unit.target: 系統提供的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProviderFactory" /> 實作，用來建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider" /> 執行個體，該執行個體會使用 SQL 資料庫儲存持續性的服務狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> class represents a factory class for a fully-functional, durable service persistence provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> 類別代表全功能的長期服務持續性提供者的處理站類別。

trans-unit.source: You can use this system-provided provider to persist and retrieve state information about a durable [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此系統提供的提供者，持續儲存並擷取長期 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服務的相關狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: In addition to persistence, the provider created by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> class implements locking of service state data records by inheriting from the abstract <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 除了持續性之外，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> 類別建立的提供者也繼承了抽象 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider> 類別，以實作服務狀態資料記錄的鎖定。

trans-unit.source: Methods that interact with persisted data (such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider.Create%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider.Update%2A>) have an optional parameter (`lockInstance`) that defines whether locks on the data in question are released or maintained.
trans-unit.target: 方法與互動的持續性資料 (例如<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider.Create%2A>或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider.Update%2A>) 有選擇性參數 (`lockInstance`)，定義上述資料的鎖定為解除或維持。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceException> exceptions thrown by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> do not have their exception details hidden by default.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceException> 擲回的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> 例外狀況不會隱藏其例外狀況詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: To protect against security vulnerabilities, these details can be hidden by setting <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowServiceAttributes.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止安全性弱點，這些詳細資料可以藉由設定隱藏<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowServiceAttributes.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>至`false`。

trans-unit.source: The SQL Persistence Provider stores and retrieves data from a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: SQL 持續性提供者會在 SQL Server 資料庫儲存與擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: The host must create a secure SQL Server environment to protect against attackers gaining read/write access to the instance state either in the database or on the wire between the application and the database.
trans-unit.target: 主機必須建立安全的 SQL Server 環境，避免攻擊者讀/寫資料庫內 (或應用程式與資料庫間通訊) 的執行個體狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Overloads of the constructor for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> class provide parameters for setting the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> 類別的各個多載建構函式提供了多種參數，以進行下列設定︰

trans-unit.source: The connection string used for accessing the SQL database.
trans-unit.target: 用來存取 SQL 資料庫的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: The lock time-out used for defining lock ownership duration.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定逾時，用來定義鎖定擁有權的有效期間。

trans-unit.source: Whether the persistence data is serialized as XML or binary data.
trans-unit.target: 持續性資料會序列化為 XML 或二進位資料。

trans-unit.source: The collection of parameters used by the new persistence provider factory.
trans-unit.target: 新的持續性提供者處理站所使用的參數集合。

trans-unit.source: Valid parameters include <see langword="lockTimeout" />, <see langword="connectionStringName" />, and <see langword="serializeAsText" />.
trans-unit.target: 有效參數包括 <see langword="lockTimeout" />、<see langword="connectionStringName" /> 與 <see langword="serializeAsText" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory" /> class, configured with the specified parameter collection.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory" /> 類別的新執行個體，以指定的參數集合加以設定。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used to arbitrarily specify `lockTimeout`, `connectionString`, and `serializeAsText` without specifying the other parameters as required by the other constructors (for example, to specify the `connectionString` and `lockTimeout` parameters without specifying the `serializeAsText` parameter.)
trans-unit.target: 此建構函式可用來任意指定 `lockTimeout`、`connectionString` 與 `serializeAsText`，而不用指定其他建構函式所需的其他參數 (例如，直接指定 `connectionString` 與 `lockTimeout` 參數，而不用指定 `serializeAsText` 參數)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> class using a parameters collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用參數集合，來建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The connection parameters for the new persistence provider instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的持續性提供者執行個體的連接參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory" /> class, configured with the specified connection string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory" /> 類別的新執行個體，以指定的連線字串設定。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> class using a connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用連線字串，來建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The connection parameters for the new persistence provider instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的持續性提供者執行個體的連接參數。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether data is serialized as text rather than binary.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料是否要序列化成文字，而非二進位。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory" /> class, configured with the specified connection string and <see langword="serializeAsText" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory" /> 類別的新執行個體，以指定的連線字串與 <see langword="serializeAsText" /> 參數加以設定。

trans-unit.source: The default value for `serializeAsText` is `false`, which indicates that persistence information is serialized as binary data.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為`serializeAsText`是`false`，表示持續性資訊會序列化為二進位資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The connection parameters for the new persistence provider factory instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的持續性提供者處理站執行個體的連接參數。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether data is serialized as text rather than binary.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料是否要序列化成文字，而非二進位。

trans-unit.source: The time-out for lock ownership.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定擁有權的逾時值。

trans-unit.source: Locked instances are automatically unlocked after this time period.
trans-unit.target: 經過此時間後，鎖定的執行個體會自動解除鎖定。

trans-unit.source: A time-out of <see langword="TimeSpan.Zero" /> specifies that no locking is used.
trans-unit.target: 若逾時值為 <see langword="TimeSpan.Zero" />，表示不會使用鎖定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory" /> class, configured with the specified connection string, <see langword="serializeAsText" />, and <see langword="lockTimeout" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory" /> 類別的新執行個體，以指定的連線字串、 <see langword="serializeAsText" /> 與 <see langword="lockTimeout" />參數加以設定。

trans-unit.source: The default value for `serializeAsText` is `false`, which indicates that persistence information is serialized as binary data.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為`serializeAsText`是`false`，表示持續性資訊會序列化為二進位資料。

trans-unit.source: The default value for `lockTimeout` is `TimeSpan.Zero`, which indicates that locking is not used.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為`lockTimeout`是`TimeSpan.Zero`，表示該鎖定未使用。

trans-unit.source: If `TimeSpan.MaxValue` is used, then locks are maintained indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 如果`TimeSpan.MaxValue`使用時，則會無限期保留鎖定。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection parameters for persistence provider instances created with this factory.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用這個處理站建立的持續性提供者執行個體的連接參數。

trans-unit.source: The connection parameters for persistence provider instances created with this factory.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個處理站建立的持續性提供者執行個體的連接參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set and access the `ConnectionString` property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何設定並存取 `ConnectionString` 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the persistence provider being created.
trans-unit.target: 要建立的持續性提供者之唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider" /> instance that uses a SQL database as its persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體，此個體使用 SQL 資料庫作為其持續性存放區。

trans-unit.source: A newly-created <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 新建立的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: The initialized persistence provider uses the current parameters of the creating factory (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory.ConnectionString%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory.LockTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory.SerializeAsText%2A>), even if the factory's parameters are changed after the persistence provider is created.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的持續性提供者會使用建立處理站的目前參數 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory.ConnectionString%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory.LockTimeout%2A> 與 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory.SerializeAsText%2A>)，即使持續性提供者建立後，Factory 的參數有變更。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to execute the `CreateProvider` method.
trans-unit.target: 以下程式碼範例將說明如何執行 `CreateProvider` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the resulting provider is accessed as a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider> instance.
trans-unit.target: 注意，產生的提供者會當作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.LockingPersistenceProvider> 執行個體來存取。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default time-out value used when persistence providers created with this factory are closed.
trans-unit.target: 取得當此處理站建立的持續性提供者關閉時所用的預設逾時值。

trans-unit.source: The default time-out value.
trans-unit.target: 預設逾時值。

trans-unit.source: The default value for close time-out is 15 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 關閉逾時的預設值為 15 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default time-out value used when persistence provider is opened.
trans-unit.target: 取得當持續性提供者開啟時所用的預設逾時值。

trans-unit.source: The default time-out value.
trans-unit.target: 預設逾時值。

trans-unit.source: The default value for open time-out is 15 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 開啟逾時的預設值為 15 秒。

trans-unit.source: The time-out for lock ownership used by persistence provider instances created by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定擁有權的逾時，此執行個體建立的持續性提供者執行個體會使用它。

trans-unit.source: Locked instances are automatically unlocked after this time period.
trans-unit.target: 經過此時間後，鎖定的執行個體會自動解除鎖定。

trans-unit.source: The time-out value for lock ownership.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定擁有權的逾時值。

trans-unit.source: A time-out of `TimeSpan.Zero` specifies that no locking is used.
trans-unit.target: 若逾時值為 `TimeSpan.Zero`，表示不會使用鎖定。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to access the `LockTimeout` property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 `LockTimeout` 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Represents the Abort phase.
trans-unit.target: 表示中止階段。

trans-unit.source: `OnAbort` fires when the service host shuts down abruptly and active commands currently being processed are closed.
trans-unit.target: `OnAbort` 會關閉服務主機突然關機時引發和目前正在處理中的命令。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間，持續性提供者會在經過以後中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時要呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可區別這個特定非同步作業與其他作業。

trans-unit.source: Represents the beginning of the Close phase.
trans-unit.target: 代表「關閉」階段的開始。

trans-unit.source: The state of the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory.OnBeginClose(System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> asynchronous method call.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory.OnBeginClose(System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 非同步方法呼叫的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The Close phase occurs when the service is closed.
trans-unit.target: 「關閉」階段發生在服務關閉時。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間，持續性提供者會在經過以後中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時要呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可區別這個特定非同步作業與其他作業。

trans-unit.source: Represents the beginning of the Open phase.
trans-unit.target: 代表「開啟」階段的開始。

trans-unit.source: The state of the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory.OnBeginOpen(System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> asynchronous method call.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory.OnBeginOpen(System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 非同步方法呼叫的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The Open phase occurs when the service is opened.
trans-unit.target: 「開啟」階段發生在服務開啟時。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間，持續性提供者會在經過以後中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: Represents the Close phase.
trans-unit.target: 表示關閉階段。

trans-unit.source: The Close phase occurs when the service is closed.
trans-unit.target: 「關閉」階段發生在服務關閉時。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 作業結果的參考。

trans-unit.source: Represents the end of the Close phase.
trans-unit.target: 代表「關閉」階段的結束。

trans-unit.source: The Close phase occurs when the service is closed.
trans-unit.target: 「關閉」階段發生在服務關閉時。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 作業結果的參考。

trans-unit.source: Represents the end of the Open phase.
trans-unit.target: 代表「開啟」階段的結束。

trans-unit.source: The Open phase occurs when the service is opened.
trans-unit.target: 「開啟」階段發生在服務開啟時。

trans-unit.source: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts this attempt.
trans-unit.target: 一段時間，持續性提供者會在經過以後中止這次嘗試。

trans-unit.source: Represents the Open phase.
trans-unit.target: 表示開啟階段。

trans-unit.source: The Open phase occurs when the service is opened.
trans-unit.target: 「開啟」階段發生在服務開啟時。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether data is serialized as text rather than binary in persistence providers created with this factory.
trans-unit.target: 指定此處理站建立的持續性提供者中，資料要序列化成文字，而非二進位。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the service information is serialized as text; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果服務資訊序列化為文字，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value for `serializeAsText` is `false`, which indicates that persistence information is serialized as binary data.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為`serializeAsText`是`false`，表示持續性資訊會序列化為二進位資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to access the `SerializeAsText` property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 `SerializeAsText` 屬性。
